【now.com體育】所謂「禮多人不怪」，但是送錯禮卻會弄得雙方都尷尬不堪，甚至演變成關公災難！

話說周日英超，阿仙奴作客愛華頓大勝5:2，外國博彩公司SportPesa特意在Twitter為周日牛一的雲加賀壽，指這是慶祝教授68歲生日的超級禮物，又指兵工廠贏在質素。有趣的是，SportPesa不久便刪去有關訊息，畢竟他們是愛華頓的球衣贊助商，實不該熱烈慶祝拖肥大敗，故此後知後覺，避免令雙方難以下台。

拖肥今季新增贊助，SportPesa是其中之一，他們是在肯亞注冊的博彩公司，今年5月簽約5年。同時，球隊亦加入了手臂贊助，那是著名手遊《憤怒鳥》。

球隊各項賽事已是近5場不勝，僅得2和3負，而目前在英超以8分排名第18位，領隊朗奴高文屢傳被炒。

Loan report – Asano, Mavididi and Nwakali feature

Takuma Asano started and played 65 minutes as Stuttgart lost 1-0 to RB Leipzig.

Joel Campbell played 62 minutes as Real Betis beat Deportivo La Coruna 2-0, with Lucas Perez not involved for the visitors.

Stephy Mavididi came on in the 61st minute of Preston North End’s 3-2 loss against Wolverhampton Wanderers.

Kelechi Nwakali was brought in the 86th minute as VVV-Venlo lost 2-0 to ADO Den Haag.

Emiliano Martinez was an unused substitute as Getafe drew 1-1 with Levante.

Cohen Bramall wasn’t involved and Carl Jenkinson missed out through injury as Birmingham City lost 2-0 to Millwall.

Marc Bola was an unused substitute as Bristol Rovers were beaten 1-0 by Rochdale.

Arsene Wenger was a happy man after our win at Everton on Sunday, and afterwards he discussed the display in his post-match press conference.

This is what he said:

on if that was our best performance of the season...

Maybe the most complete defensively and offensively, yes. But it’s funny because until now, I felt that we dominated the game at Stoke, at Watford as well, and were punished for every single mistake. We couldn’t finish our chances but today we created more - I think we had [28] shots on goal and away from home, that’s an impressive number.

on squad depth…

Look, we just played at Belgrade and won 1-0 with 10 completely different players. We have quality, but what is very important is our team play. After that, at the end of our team play, if we have players of Ozil’s quality, you want always the best possible individual quality. When you look, I had Giroud on the bench, I had Walcott on the bench, I had Wilshere on the bench, I had Iwobi on the bench. Offensively, it’s top quality.

This is what he said:

on if that was our best performance of the season...

Maybe the most complete defensively and offensively, yes. But it’s funny because until now, I felt that we dominated the game at Stoke, at Watford as well, and were punished for every single mistake. We couldn’t finish our chances but today we created more - I think we had [28] shots on goal and away from home, that’s an impressive number.

on squad depth…

Look, we just played at Belgrade and won 1-0 with 10 completely different players. We have quality, but what is very important is our team play. After that, at the end of our team play, if we have players of Ozil’s quality, you want always the best possible individual quality. When you look, I had Giroud on the bench, I had Walcott on the bench, I had Wilshere on the bench, I had Iwobi on the bench. Offensively, it’s top quality.

你咪又係,仲要搞到大波妹唔做啦

結婚25年、妻子為教師的採購經理，今年8月4日在港鐵大學站的一列列車上，見坐於他對面的女乘客彎身綁鞋帶，即拿起手機連環偷拍對方的胸部，惟事主女友人實坐於採購經理身旁，友人黃雀在後發現即時揭發並報警。

採購經理姜志輝（56歲）今在裁判法院承認作出有違公德的行為罪，當日拍攝女事主9張胸部照。他於警誡下承認因一時衝動犯案，今求情則承認因為「貪得意」，現已得到教訓。
裁判官將案押後至11月6日判刑，期間索取被告的感化及社會服務令報告，被告獲准以現金500元保釋候判，但明言這不代表不會判被告入獄。

【now.com體育】曼城開季表現神勇，領隊哥迪奧拿就為球隊減減壓，指肯定不可能以不敗身完成球季。

在今季所有賽事，曼城13戰皆保持不敗，最近11場更全勝，平了球隊的連勝紀錄；在英超，他們9戰豪取8勝1和領導群雄，而且合共攻入33球。由於大捷連連，外界已把這支藍月，跟2003/04球季以不敗身贏得英超的阿仙奴相提並論。

哥迪奧拿（Pep Guardiola）表示：「要以不敗身地完成球季，是不可能發生的事。因為我們有很多比賽，參戰很多賽事，對球員需求十分高，要保持不敗聽起來非常荒謬。我們將會落敗，而且不會太自滿或放鬆。」

哥帥又拿上季NBA總冠軍勇士做比喻，指就算是勇士有時也會落敗：「我們總會有低潮的時候，到時我會很好奇，將會測試一下我和球員將會如何面對。」

利物浦周日在英超作客以1:4大敗予熱刺，今季9戰僅得13排在聯賽榜第9位，落後榜首的曼城12分。紅軍領隊高路普賽後狠批球隊防守不濟、爭勝心不及對手，並認為球隊今季或未能取得英超前四名。

紅軍今季在九場聯賽失了16球，是球隊53年來在頂級聯賽前九場失球最多的一季，高路普說︰「今日我們不用談及前四，我們目前排在第九位，統計數據是1964年（1964/65球季）以來最差，我實在無法相信，但現在所處的位置是我們應得的。」

Organic chemistry is a chemistrysubdiscipline involving the scientific study of the structure, properties, and reactions oforganic compounds and organic materials, i.e., matter in its various forms that containcarbon atoms.[1] Study of structure includes many physical and chemical methods to determine the chemical composition and thechemical constitution of organic compounds and materials. Study of properties includes both physical properties and chemical properties, and uses similar methods as well as methods to evaluate chemical reactivity, with the aim to understand the behavior of the organic matter in its pure form (when possible), but also in solutions, mixtures, and fabricated forms. The study of organic reactions includes probing their scope through use in preparation of target compounds (e.g., natural products, drugs,polymers, etc.) by chemical synthesis, as well as the focused study of the reactivities of individual organic molecules, both in the laboratory and via theoretical (in silico) study.

Organic chemistry is a chemistrysubdiscipline involving the scientific study of the structure, properties, and reactions oforganic compounds and organic materials, i.e., matter in its various forms that containcarbon atoms.[1] Study of structure includes many physical and chemical methods to determine the chemical composition and thechemical constitution of organic compounds and materials. Study of properties includes both physical properties and chemical properties, and uses similar methods as well as methods to evaluate chemical reactivity, with the aim to understand the behavior of the organic matter in its pure form (when possible), but also in solutions, mixtures, and fabricated forms. The study of organic reactions includes probing their scope through use in preparation of target compounds (e.g., natural products, drugs,polymers, etc.) by chemical synthesis, as well as the focused study of the reactivities of individual organic molecules, both in the laboratory and via theoretical (in silico) study.
